quotes.quote: My therapist told me the way to achieve true inner peace is to finish what I start. So far I’ve finished two bags of M&M's and a chocolate cake. I feel better already.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
quotes.author: Lana Turner

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do NOTHING every day.
quotes.author: According to unconfirmed information it is a saying of Winnie the Pooh.

quotes.quote: I'm a smart person. I just do stupid things.
quotes.author: Author unknown

quotes.quote: In politics, stupidity is not a vice.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Regular naps prevent old age, especially if you take them while driving.
quotes.author: Author unknown

quotes.quote: My wife and I always compromise. I admit I'm wrong and she agrees with me.
quotes.author: Author unknown
